trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of design surfaces.
trans-unit.target: 包含設計介面的集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a read-only collection of design surfaces.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別提供設計介面的唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection members to the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> array beginning at the specified destination index.
trans-unit.target: 將集合的成員複製到指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref>陣列開始於指定的目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The array to copy collection members to.
trans-unit.target: 要複製集合成員的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The destination index to begin copying to.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始複製到目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of design surfaces in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得介面的設計總數<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The total number of elements in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目總數<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可逐一查看的列舉值<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>如<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the design surface at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定索引處的設計介面。

trans-unit.source: The index of the design surface to return.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在設計介面的索引。

trans-unit.source: The design surface at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引處的設計介面。

trans-unit.source: The design surface specified by index is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的設計介面 index 不支援。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>方法。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>也就是從複製值的目的地<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index in `array` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中的索引`array`開始複製的位置。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count*> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count*>屬性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的元素數目<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>屬性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果存取<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>是同步 （安全執行緒），否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>屬性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator*>方法。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection>
